important - See the migration guide (https://github.com/firebase/geofire-js/tree/master/migration#upgrading-from-geofire-3xx-to-4xx) for upgrade instructions.
changed - Removed the `rsvp` dependency in favor of internal Firebase promises.
changed - Upgraded the `firebase` dependency to `^2.4.0` and made it a peer dependency instead of a regular dependency.
